 1997-19171997-12-170,  ,  ,  ,  IA&ND
PrecisOrder (a) consenting to the use by the Province of BRITISH COLUMBIA of its statutory powers to acquire a right-of-way over some 18.35 hectares of KAMLOOPS INDIAN RESERVE NO. 1, for highway purposes or other works of public utility, and (b) authorizing the transfer of those lands to the Province, in lieu of exercising their powers.
Attachments
